attributes.action: Cease the charging of VAT on children’s school wear containing a logo
attributes.additional_details: VAT exemption on children’s wear should be absolutely applied to logo’d school clothing regardless of size of clothing
attributes.background: My 15 year old son is tall (5’ 12”) I have recently been charged VAT on his logo’d school uniform because of the size - 34”/34” trousers and a 40” chest blazer.  He is a child and will not wear these items outside school. I do not believe that VAT should have been levied.
